statements: DELETE FROM lighting_preferences WHERE schedule_id = 3 AND brightness > 50;
DELETE FROM lighting_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND schedule_id = 1;
DELETE FROM lighting_preferences WHERE brightness > 50 AND color_temperature < 3000;
DELETE FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND lighting_schedule = 'Morning'
DELETE FROM automation_routines WHERE action = 'Turn on lights' AND trigger_event = 'Motion detected'
DELETE FROM AutomationRoutines WHERE action = 'Turn off lights';
DELETE FROM AutomationRoutines WHERE routine_name = 'Morning Routine';
DELETE FROM LightingSettings WHERE setting_id IN (SELECT setting_id FROM UserSettings WHERE user_id = 102);
